item.title: HQ Capital 聘请 Ardian 的 Michael Hu 负责亚洲业务拓展
item.description: HQ Capital 是一家专注于中小型市场投资的欧洲私募股权公司，该公司聘请了 Ardian SAS 的前高管 Michael Hu 担任亚洲区主管，并在新加坡开设了新的办事处，以发掘该地区的财富。【原文：HQ Capital, an European private equity firm focusing on small to mid-market investment, hired former Ardian SAS executive Michael Hu as head of Asia and opened a new office in Singapore as it seeks to tap wealth in the region.】

item.title: 日本央行将如何处理其 4,750 亿美元的 ETF 储备？
item.description: 日本央行拥有约 70 万亿日元（约合 4750 亿美元）的交易所交易基金，这是其数十年来通过向股票市场投入资金来帮助战胜通货紧缩的运动的遗产。随着物价上涨波及整个经济，日本央行将提高利率，股票投资者面临的一个关键问题是，决策者计划如何处理这笔巨额资金，以及何时处理。减少资金将有助于央行将其政策中最非正统的部分正常化。【原文：The Bank of Japan owns around ¥70 trillion ($475 billion) of the country’s exchange-traded funds, a legacy of its decades-long campaign to help defeat deflation by pouring money into the equity market. With the BOJ set to raise interest rates as higher prices ripple through the economy, a key question for stock investors is what policymakers plan to do with this enormous pile of funds, and when. Reducing it would help the central bank normalize one of the most unorthodox parts of its policy regi】

item.title: 减税后香港公寓供应过剩将导致房价下跌
item.description: 自上个月政府取消额外的房产税以来，香港的房屋销售已经恢复了活力。供应过剩意味着房价反弹可能需要更长的时间。【原文：Hong Kong’s home sales have roared back to life since the government scrapped extra property taxes last month. A supply glut means a rebound in prices is likely to take much longer.】

item.title: 锂矿开采商 Liontown 赢得澳大利亚项目融资
item.description: 澳大利亚狮城资源有限公司（Liontown Resources Ltd.）已同意获得 5.5 亿澳元（3.64 亿美元）的贷款，这将使其关键的凯瑟琳谷锂项目能够在今年投产，这对这家初级矿商来说是一条生命线。【原文：Australia’s Liontown Resources Ltd. has agreed to a A$550 million ($364 million) loan that will enable it to get its key Kathleen Valley lithium project into production this year, a lifeline for the junior miner.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。美国和印度在通胀困境中搏斗。波音公司的困境波及整个航空业。股市反弹遭遇质疑。TikTok 寻找计划。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. The US and India wrestle with sticky inflation. Boeing’s woes reverberate across the airline industry. Stock rally meets with skepticism. TikTok looks for a plan. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 行业报告指出美国库存下降，石油价格攀升
item.description: 由于一份行业报告指出美国原油库存减少，抵消了欧佩克减产计划的摇摆不定，石油价格在连续四天下跌后上扬。【原文：Oil advanced after four days of losses as an industry report pointed to shrinking US crude stockpiles, offsetting wavering OPEC cuts.】

item.title: 新加坡看到宏观不确定性对房地产行业的影响：新加坡通讯社
item.description: 新加坡一位部长警告说，经济的不确定性将拖累该国的房地产业，因为这个城市国家的房屋销售显示出需求疲软。【原文：A Singapore minister cautioned that economic uncertainties will weigh on the country’s real estate industry, as home sales in the city-state show flagging demand.】

item.title: 与中国相关的损失之后，韩国将审查风险金融产品
item.description: 韩国计划审查潜在高风险投资产品的销售情况，因为一项调查发现，银行向散户投资者误售了与中国挂钩的结构性产品，而这些散户投资者正面临着 40 多亿美元的损失。【原文：South Korea plans to review the sale of potentially high-risk investments after a probe found that banks missold China-linked structured products to retail investors who are facing more than $4 billion in losses.】

item.title: Wunsch 表示，随着物价回落，欧洲央行必须押注降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员皮埃尔-旺施重申，决策者最终将不得不降低借贷成本，但又不能完全确定通胀率正在恢复到 2% 的目标。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Pierre Wunsch reiterated that policymakers will eventually have to lower borrowing costs without being completely sure that inflation is returning to the 2% target.】

item.title: 阿根廷置换 500 亿美元地方债务以提前还款
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）的政府正在放宽还款计划，因此阿根廷将 42.6 万亿阿根廷比索（约合 504 亿美元）的地方债券转换为期限更长的债务，这也是该国历史上最大的一次国内债务展期。【原文：Argentina swapped 42.6 trillion pesos ($50.4 billion) of local notes for longer date debt as President Javier Milei’s government moves to ease its repayment schedule, setting up the largest domestic rollover in the country’s history.】

item.title: 美国CPI下降后，多数亚洲股市有望上涨：市场综述
item.description: 尽管通胀数据高于预期，但交易商仍坚持押注美联储今年将降息。【原文：Most stocks in Asia look set to rise after the S&P 500 closed at a fresh record, with traders sticking to bets on Federal Reserve rate cuts for this year despite hotter-than-expected inflation data.】

item.title: 收益达 1,900% 的股票投资者打破了日本的长期沉默
item.description: 近三十年来，斯蒂芬-巴特的公司大多处于幕后，作为沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）传统的长期投资者，它认为很少有理由引起人们的注意。【原文：For almost three decades, Stephen Butt’s company mostly stayed behind the scenes, a long-term investor in the tradition of Warren Buffett that saw little reason to draw attention to itself.】

item.title: 最高金融监管机构称终止 "韩国折扣 "是关键目标
item.description: 韩国最高金融监管机构表示，韩国决心结束股市长期打折的状况，建立一个鼓励散户投资者和公司依靠股票筹集财富和资本的体系。【原文：South Korea is determined to end a perennial discount of its stock market and create a system that encourages retail investors and companies to rely on equities to raise wealth and capital, the country’s top financial regulator said.】

item.title: 中国各省扩大解决地方政府债务压力的选择范围
item.description: 随着借贷习惯成为中国政府的首要经济议程，中国地方政府融资工具正转向更多样化的债务解决方式，试图避免成为首个在公开市场违约的此类实体。【原文：Chinese local government financing vehicles are turning to more diverse fixes for spiraling debt, trying to avoid becoming the first such entity to default in public markets as their borrowing habits become a top economic agenda in Beijing.】

item.title: 安赛乐米塔尔收购瓦卢瑞克 10.4 亿美元股权
item.description: 安赛乐米塔尔公司（ArcelorMittal SA）同意收购钢管公司瓦卢瑞克公司（Vallourec SA）价值 10.4 亿美元（9.55 亿欧元）的股权，以提高其在更多高附加值产品领域的风险敞口。【原文：ArcelorMittal SA agreed to buy an equity stake worth $1.04 billion (€955 million) in tubular steel company Vallourec SA as it seeks to boost its exposure to more value-added products.】

item.title: 物理奇才如何在大自然的灾难中赚得盆满钵满
item.description: 投资巨灾债券是 2023 年最赚钱的对冲基金策略。约翰-徐（John Seo）利用他的物理学背景，为他的基金费马（Fermat）制定了一个致胜公式，在气候变化和通货膨胀的影响下，市场正在蓬勃发展。【原文：Investing in catastrophe bonds was the most profitable hedge fund strategy of 2023. John Seo used his physics background to develop a winning formula for his fund, Fermat, in a market that’s booming thanks to climate change and inflation.】

item.title: Coinbase Global 计划发行 10 亿美元可转换债券
item.description: 美国最大的加密货币交易所 Coinbase Global Inc. 表示，计划发行 10 亿美元的可转换优先票据，用于偿还现有债务和一般企业用途。【原文：Coinbase Global Inc., the largest US cryptocurrency exchange, said it plans to offer $1 billion in convertible senior notes to repay existing debt and for general corporate purposes.】

item.title: 维勒鲁瓦称欧洲央行普遍同意春季降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，随着抗通胀战役的胜利，欧洲中央银行普遍同意在春季开始降息。【原文：There’s broad agreement at the European Central Bank to begin lowering interest in the spring as the battle against inflation is being won, according to Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau.】

item.title: Citadel 的格里芬称美联储应放慢脚步以避免 "毁灭性的进程
item.description: Citadel 公司创始人肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）表示，美联储应缓慢降低利率，以避免日后不得不反其道而行之的可能性。【原文：Citadel founder Ken Griffin said the Federal Reserve should move slowly in lowering interest rates to avoid the possibility of having to reverse course later.】

item.title: 比特币的风险偏好引发 "巨大的 "杠杆 ETF 资金流
item.description: 随着数字资产屡创新高，人们对提供比特币杠杆敞口的投资工具的需求正在飙升。【原文：Demand for the investment vehicles that offer leveraged exposure to Bitcoin is soaring as the digital asset hits record highs.】

item.title: 波音公司的灾难将其股价推至有史以来与空中客车公司的最大差距
item.description: 随着波音公司（Boeing Co.）面临的麻烦不断加深并在航空业引起反响，这家飞机制造商正进一步落后于其最大的竞争对手空中客车公司（Airbus SE）。【原文：As the troubles faced by Boeing Co. deepen and reverberate through the airline industry, the planemaker is falling even further behind its biggest competitor, Airbus SE.】

item.title: 欧佩克（OPEC）减产，美国石油产量增幅超预期
item.description: 根据美国政府的预测，今年美国石油产量的增长速度将快于此前的预期，有助于在欧佩克及其盟国限制产量的情况下缓解全球供应压力。【原文：Oil production in the US this year will increase faster than previously expected, helping cushion global supplies as OPEC and its allies restrict output, according to government forecasts.】

item.title: 凯雷因利率上升而放弃核心基础设施基金计划
item.description: 据知情人士透露，由于利率攀升，凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. scrapped plans to raise an open-ended fund dedicated to long-term infrastructure bets as interest rates climbed, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 利息成本导致美国五个月内预算缺口达 8,280 亿美元
item.description: 2 月份，利息成本继续导致美国预算赤字扩大，使联邦政府本财年前五个月的总体赤字达到 8,280 亿美元。【原文：Interest costs continued to drive the US budget deficit wider in February, pushing the federal government’s overall gap to $828 billion for the first five months of the fiscal year.】

item.title: 可可价格突破每吨 7,000 美元，巧克力制造商涨价并收缩包装
item.description: 可可期货盘中再创新高，在纽约首次突破 7,000 美元，因为供应问题推动了可可期货的上涨，但没有迹象表明这将缓解巧克力生产商的压力。【原文：Cocoa futures rose to a fresh intraday record, topping $7,000 in New York for the first time, as supply concerns drive a rally that shows no sign of offering relief for chocolate makers.】

item.title: 华尔街认为美联储缩减量化宽松政策的开始日期有可能推迟
item.description: 在美联储官员准备在下周的会议上深入讨论其资产负债表之际，华尔街的策略师们只能同意，央行正在讨论的所有计划都带有一些日益增长的风险。【原文：As Federal Reserve officials prepare for an in-depth conversation about its balance sheet at next week’s meeting, Wall Street strategists can only agree that all of the plans being discussed by the central bank carry some growing risks.】

item.title: 普京表示支持欧佩克+减产石油，但警告存在风险
item.description: 俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京说，俄罗斯与石油输出国组织（OPEC）伙伴合作进行的石油减产支持了国家的收入，但也可能导致市场份额的损失。【原文：Russia’s oil-production cuts made in cooperation with OPEC partners have supported the nation’s revenue yet may result in a loss of the market share, said President Vladimir Putin.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚总统确认竞选下一任北约领导人
item.description: 罗马尼亚总统克劳斯-约哈尼斯确认将接任下一任北大西洋公约组织（North Atlantic Treaty Organization）领导人，并表示北大西洋公约组织（North Atlantic Treaty Organization）需要一个 "全新的视角"，需要来自东翼的领导人。【原文：Romanian President Klaus Iohannis confirmed his bid to take over as the next North Atlantic Treaty Organization chief, saying the military alliance needs a “fresh perspective” with leadership from its eastern flank.】

item.title: 波多黎各电力局计划发行的 "涡轮 "债券被视为公用事业公司的蓝图
item.description: 波多黎各破产电力局提出的债务重组计划包括一种烟草清偿债务中常见的融资方式，可作为其他电力公司寻求融资以满足资本需求的蓝本。【原文：The debt-restructuring plan put forward by Puerto Rico’s bankrupt power authority includes a type of financing common among tobacco-settlement debt that may serve as a blueprint for other utilities seeking to raise money to meet capital needs.】

item.title: 高盛称欧洲房地产估值接近底部
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：European commercial real estate valuations are close to a bottom after a slump driven by worries about interest rates and the economy, according to analysts at Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】
